title: The Gary Null Show
content:
A discussion about the recent attack on alternative medical practice and supplemental nutrition, with Dr. <!--more--> Victoria Maizes.

Dr Victoria Maizes is the Executive Director of the University of Arizona Center for Integrative Medicine, founded by Dr Andrew Weil, and a Professor of Medicine, Family Medicine and Public Health.
Internationally recognized as a leader in integrative medicine, she stewarded the growth of the Arizona Center for Integrative Medicine from a small program educating four residential fellows per year to a designated Center of Excellence training more than 400 residents and fellows annually.
Dr Maizes is the co-editor of the Oxford University textbook Women’s Integrative Health and is the author of “Be Fruitful: The Essential Guide to Maximizing Fertility and Giving Birth to a Healthy Child, scheduled for release this September.
In 2009 Dr Maizes was named one of the world’s 25 intelligent optimists by ODE magazine.
Her website is VictoriaMaizesMD.com
